channel.title: flask-web-service on Abhishek Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in flask-web-service on Abhishek Sharma

item.title: nyctaxiservice
item.description: This is an example of a web service which exposes the data in a google big-query table as a web service. Currently it provides 3 endpoints which help to query data present in the NYC Taxi Dataset. You can find the source code of the application here. A demo has been deployed at nyxtaxiservice. Note: On live demo at nyxtaxiservice there are currently some issues with the endpoint avg_fare_by_s2id
